Articles.Content:
Can anyone make and airliner mod that contains: Passenger (double and single decker please) & Cargo fuselages, TurboProp engines, Turbofan engines, wings, tail fins etc. i know that you can combine mods to get what i am looking for but that makes KSP hard to run and i get lots of crashes (the game ones) after reverting to the SPH a few times in one session. If anyone could do this then I would be greatly appreitiative of the time and effort gone into the mod and will use it in all of my youtube videos and make airliners for download with those parts. Right now i use B9 Aerospace, KAX, B9 Procedural Wings and Falcon Works to make realistic looking airliners, Please check out the KAAaT thread in Spacecraft Exchange, then Rocket Buildes sub-forum.

Thank You

Kind Regards

CamJK (CamJKerman)

My Channel: Cam JKerman (on youtube)
I can see the need for it...I for one could use such a mod for an upcoming series I am working on to feature the CSS.

I know that [SXT](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542-90-SXT-Lack-s-Stock-Extension-N-1-and-Aero-update-SXT-20-15FEV15-KSC-v3) has some airliner parts although last I checked it doesn't have any props other than a tiny 0.625m one.

[CoffeeIndustries](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98041) had an extensive passenger plane mod, but it hasn't been updated in a while.

[FantomWorks-KAX-Part-Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109567) has a passenger plane under development, but isn't quite ready yet.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-27T20:48:39Z" title="02/27/2015 08:48  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 27, 2015</time> by ultrasquid**
